dublin_core.dcvalue: Low bandwidth has long been a reason for the unsuitability of wireless internet in telemedicine However with the advent of extended third generation wireless as an economically accessible high speed network more opportunities are being created in this area of telemedicine This paper explores the opportunity created by the latest wireless broadband technology for remote monitoring of patients in the home
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
